==Century breaks==
There were 27 [[century break]]s made during the tournament.<ref>{{cite web |title=Tournament centuries 2023/24 |url=https://snookerinfo.co.uk/2023-24-centuries/ |publisher=Snooker Info |date=14 January 2024 |access-date=14 January 2024 |archive-date=14 January 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240114234812/https://snookerinfo.co.uk/2023-24-centuries/}}</ref><ref name="WST_Live_Scores" /> The highest of these was two [[maximum break]]s, the first by Ding Junhui in the opening round,<ref name="Ding_147" /> and secondly by Mark Allen in the quarter-finals.<ref name="WST_Allen_147" /><ref name="Eurosport_Allen_147" /> The nine century breaks made by Carter were the most made by any player at a single Masters tournament.<ref name="Sky_final" />
